tech_news.title: The Switch 2 is still on sale at multiple retailers if you missed out during Cyber Monday - The Verge
tech_news.description: The Switch 2 is still relatively new, so deals are rare. However, you can still get Nintendo’s latest console with a free copy of Mario Kart World for a limited time.

tech_news.title: Android’s new ‘Call Reason’ flags important calls before you even pick up - The Verge
tech_news.description: Android’s Call Reason feature will allow you to flag calls as “urgent” on the receiving person’s incoming call screen and in their call history.

tech_news.title: Epic Games Store decides "at the last minute" not to distribute Horses - GamesIndustry.biz
tech_news.description: Epic Games Store is the latest online storefront to withdraw support for the provocative indie game, Horses.

tech_news.title: The 15 Best Gaming Deals Still Live After Black Friday and Cyber Monday - IGN
tech_news.description: Here's the best gaming deals you can still pick after the Black Friday and Cyber Monday sales weekend concluded, including discounts on Switch 2 consoles, Xbox Game Pass, PS5 games, and more.

tech_news.title: Netflix launches a mobile-friendly version of Red Dead Redemption - TechCrunch
tech_news.description: Players with a Netflix subscription can now download the game, which features mobile-friendly controls, including touch-screen shooting and navigation. It's important to note that the game does not feature a multiplayer mode and players must be connected to t…

tech_news.title: Leak reveals Apple Health app might soon connect to ChatGPT - 9to5Mac
tech_news.description: A new leak reveals that ChatGPT might soon be able to integrate your Apple Health app data to guide its health-related knowledge.

tech_news.title: Samsung reveals Galaxy Z TriFold with 10-inch foldable screen, astronomical price - Ars Technica
tech_news.description: Samsung’s long-awaited tri-fold phone is launching in Korea this month, with a US launch early next year.

tech_news.title: YouTube releases its first-ever recap of videos you’ve watched - TechCrunch
tech_news.description: YouTube Recap features a set of up to 12 different cards that highlight a user's top channels, interests, the evolution of their viewing habits, and which personality type they fall into based on the videos they loved to watch.

tech_news.title: Fallout 76: Burning Springs Release Notes - Bethesda.net
tech_news.description: Grab your duster, hat, and your favorite weapon because it’s time for some Bounty Hunting! Explore our largest map addition yet and hunt down some of the largest bounties Burning Springs has to offer.
